description:
A year ago, Shin betrayed his master`s orders and fought Kenshiro, stealing Kenshiro`s lover Yuria. Kenshiro goes alone to the fortress to look for Yuria, but no one is there.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Can the Flames of Love Burn in Hell? You Don`t Even Know You`re Already Dead!!
Jigoku ni Saku ka Ai no Honoo. Omae wa Mou Shinde Iru!!
Können die Flammen der Liebe in der Hölle Brennen? Du weißt nicht mal, dass du bereits tot bist!!
地獄に咲くか愛の炎. おまえはもう死んでいる!!
